properties.notes: 03/01230/RM. Approval of Reserved matters redevelopment of site by means of 10 no dwellinghouses and 4 no flats

properties.name: BR-023
properties.site-address: Universal Garage Co Ltd, Silver Street, Whitby
properties.notes: 07/01949/FL. Erection of 10 apartments and 3 houses with associated garaging, access, landscaping including demolition of existing vacant garage building

properties.name: BR-024
properties.notes: 16/00426/FL. Demolition of existing garage and erection of 14 no. flats with parking and alterations to existing building to create a dwelling
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-025
properties.notes: 14/01141/OL. Demolition of offices and industrial buildings and erection of 45 residential dwellings including 7 affordable houses, creation of retail shop (A1), open space and associated infrastructure
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-026
properties.notes: Demolition of existing premises and construction of retail units and dwellings
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-027
properties.notes: The site was previously derelict although there is now a car repair use there (planning application forthcoming April 2017). It remains an option for brownfield housing development and could accommodate circa 20 units on the site.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-028
properties.notes: The site is behind a recently developed apartment scheme. It is shoe-horned in between housing and appears to be in some form of storage use, albeit the buildings are run-down. The site could accommodate a minimum of 12 units on the site, more depending on the form of housing.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-029
properties.notes: The site is in employment use and was identified in the SHELAA as a site that would be appropriate for residential use if it became available. It is unknown if this is deliverable in the short term but if so it could accommodate circa 30 dwellings.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-030
properties.notes: 14/02177/OL. Demolition of existing premises and construction of retail units and dwellings. Awaiting S106.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-031
properties.site-address: Goodie New Shoes, 37-39 Huntriss Row, Scarborough
properties.notes: 13/02612/FL. Conversion of floors above retail premises and erection of four storey extension to the rear (facing Falconers Square) to provide 7 flats (2 x 1 Bed & 5 x 2 Bed)
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-032
properties.notes: 07/01990/FL. Proposed conversion of former auction rooms and offices to 9no flats
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-033
properties.site-address: Warehouse adjacent to 19/20 Albemarle Crescent, Scarborough
properties.notes: 10/02272/FL. Extension to time limit relating to application reference 07/01824/FL for the demolition of two dwellings and carpet warehouse and the erection of 24 self contained two bedroomed flats
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-034
properties.notes: Site is to be available shortly (Summer 2017) following the opening of the new Weaponness Leisure Village. This site could accommodate a minimum of 40 dwellings in a combination of houses and apartment. This could ne reduced if a suitable mixed scheme was proposed.
properties.ownership-status: owned by a public authority

properties.name: BR-035
properties.notes: Site is to the south of current permission for residential development and is suitable for further residential development on the footprint of the existing industrial units and hardstanding areas. It is considered the site could accommodate circa 40 units as included in the housing trajectory of the Local Plan.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
